name: ONE BUTTON NIPPLE GOLF
description:
P1 - Space and Mouse1 (Tap and hold on mobile devices)
P2 - S
P3 - F
P4 - H
P5 - K
P6 - Enter

Press 2-6 to add more players

I always get hurt because people take sex more seriously than me. Would you treat me so differently if we had just finished an exhilarating round of golf? Are the two activities that different?
